parameters.prompt: pop, dreamy, nostalgic, synth-pop, electronic, shimmering, vocals, upbeat
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Stars align in distant skies / Your voice hums through the telephone lines / Static buzz like fireflies / But I still hear you every time [chorus] We’re ghosts in the radio waves / Singing echoes from a brighter day / Lost in the frequency haze / But the signal never fades away [verse] Polaroid stuck in my pocket / Fading colors, but the moment won’t stop it / Rewind the tape, let’s press play / Before the memories slip away [chorus] We’re ghosts in the radio waves / Singing echoes from a brighter day / Lost in the frequency haze / But the signal never fades away [bridge] Dial it back to 1999 / When every song felt like a lifeline / Can you hear me through the noise? / I’m still singing for you, my static joy [outro] Fading out like a distant station / But love’s the perfect modulation
